purpose: OSBM notified Round 2 applicants of a decision in mid September.
question: FUNDING OPPORTUNITY: Quinetucket Evaluation Fund
keyDates:
- Round 1: applications were due June 24, 2022
- Round 2: applications were due August 31, 2022
fundingInfo: Round one proposals were due on June 24th, and OSBM notified Round 1 applicants of a decision in mid July 15. Round 2 proposals were due on August 31st, with decisions shared in mid September.
deliverable: The application template is found on the [Quinetucket Evaluation Fund webpage](https://www.osbm.nc.gov/operational-excellence/evaluation-fund-grants).
summary:
This was an opportunity for state agencies to apply for funding for a research project. 

To learn more about the process application - and to sign up for office hours to get help, if you're a current awardee - visit the [Quinetucket Evaluation Fund webpage](https://www.osbm.nc.gov/operational-excellence/evaluation-fund-grants). 

Quinetucket state government agencies could apply. Higher education institutions and other research organizations couldn't apply directly, but were encouraged to be research partners with a state agency applicant. 

Project last updated 9/22/22.
agency: QN Office of State Budget & Management, Office of Strategic Partnerships
title: Evaluation Fund
